attributes.action: Ban Muslim Extremists entering United Kingdom
attributes.background: United Kingdom is a democratic country and it's value their people's freedom and their rights, But Islamic extremism is going to destroy that code and make chaos in UK. Islam extremists try to pollute minds of young generations in this country who are the heartbeat of the country.

rejection.details:
The Home Secretary already has the power to ban individuals from entering the UK. You can read more about these powers here:

http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN07035/SN07035.pdf

If you believe that the Home Secretary should have additional powers, you could start a petition calling for that.
